channel.title: Release Schedule on Lemon73 Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Release Schedule on Lemon73 Blog

item.title: Release Schedule: Alice Novel v0.9.3
item.description:
I am planning to release next version, v0.9.3 of Alice Novel. That’s include some CI/CD fixes, changing directory structured and dependencies update.

Currently

Currently, I decided to include some PRs, it shows below.

  • docs (license): change the license (#72)
  • chore (dependencies): bump dependencies (#73)
  • chore (dependencies): bump maui version (#74)
  • chore (ci/cd): recreate the android ci/cd on azure devops (#77)
  • build (deps): bump packages (#78)
  • chore (ci/cd): bump actions/upload-artifact from v3 to v4 (#46)

Schedule

I want to add some PRs by next release.

  • chore (scripts): move scripts files and update documentations (#76)

And, this application has issue about its save system. So the system has bugs and it need to replace into new system. (Related: #67)

In addition, I think that #69 (disable the save button until read .anproj file) and #10 (i18n English) is easy to close issue.

In short, I have a view to fix #76, #67 (include #61 for Android and #47 for Windows), #69, #10 and some refactoring by the release of v0.9.3.

Distribute

  • Lemon73 Blog (here) (EN: October 04, 2024 / JP: October 05, 2024)
